pkgmetadata.longdescription: Twinkle is a soft phone for your voice over IP communcations using the SIP protocol. You can use it for direct IP phone to IP phone communication or in a network using a SIP proxy to route your calls.

use.flag: Enables use of ilbc (RFC3951) audio encoding
Enables use of secure rtp using the zrtp extension of GNU RTP stack developed by Phil Zimmermann
